artist: Aegidius Sadeler; After Hans van Aachen
description: seated Virgin holding a child; angel holding a lily behind her on right; woman's head visible at her left; man holding back drape far left; man wearing turban with back to viewer left foreground; bowl of fruit on table right foreground
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

below image in black: Auctori rerum nascenti e Virgine passim/ Laeta uuas, poma, et lilia fundit humus.  / Nos animæ uiles cur huic non rite paramus F, Valerini / Mentem animumq pium, puraq, corda Deo? / S: C: M\'tis pict  Iohan ab Ach pinxit  Egidius Sadeler sculps. Veron:  |on sheet in pencil: L-3
title: Print
